title: CHAPTER I. FACES IN THE FIRE.

book.title: Miss Mephistopheles
book.description: 简介： A wet Sunday--dreary, dismal, and infinitely sloppy. Even the bells ringing the people into evening service seemed to feel the depressing influence of the weather, and their brazen voices sounded hoarse and grumbling, as if they rang under protest. C...
